title: "layers"

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(maplibre)
```

```{r}
nc <- sf::st_read(system.file("shape/nc.shp", package="sf")) |>
  sf::st_transform("EPSG:4236")

# sf::st_crs(nc)

bounds <- sf::st_bbox(nc) |>
  unname() |>
  as.list()

nc_source <- list(
  type = "geojson",
  data = geojsonsf::sf_geojson(nc)
)
```

## Line

```{r}
nc_layer <- Layer(
  type = "line",
  id = "nc",
  source = nc_source
)

maplibre(mapOptions(style = basemaps$carto$voyager, bounds = bounds)) |>
  add_layer(nc_layer)
```

## Fill

```{r}
nc_layer <- Layer(
  type = "fill",
  id = "nc",
  source = nc_source,
  paint = list("fill-color" = "steelblue", "fill-outline-color" = "darkred" )
)

maplibre(mapOptions(style = basemaps$carto$voyager, bounds = bounds)) |>
  add_layer(nc_layer)
```
